name: CauseOfLoss
title: Cause Of Loss
description: Cause Of Loss codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Damage resulting from the failure or improper functioning of household appliances such as washing machines, dishwashers, or refrigerators.
Physical injury to a person's body.
Unauthorized entry into a building or structure with the intent to commit theft or another crime.
Structural failure or collapse of an above-ground swimming pool.
Sudden failure or falling down of a building or part of a building structure.
Structural failure or collapse of an in-ground swimming pool.
Structural collapse caused by the accumulated weight of ice or snow on a roof or structure.
Collapse or structural failure where the specific cause has not been determined.
Secondary or indirect damage that results as a consequence of an initial covered event.

concept.display: Credit Card Forgery and Counterfeit Money
concept.definition: Loss arising from fraudulent credit cards or acceptance of counterfeit currency.

designation.value: Contrefaçon de cartes de crédit et fausse monnaie
Falsificación de tarjetas de crédito y dinero falso

concept.definition: Ground shaking or tremors caused by seismic activity.
Loss of electrical power or damage caused by sudden voltage spikes in electrical systems.
Being trapped or confined within a space or structure.
Fire that was deliberately set or is suspected to have been intentionally ignited.

designation.value: Incendio - Incendio provocado/sospecha de incendio provocado

concept.definition: Fire caused by improper or negligent use of candles or matches.
Fire caused by improper disposal of smoking materials or careless smoking behavior.
Fire originating from cooking activities or ignition of cooking oils and grease.

designation.value: Incendio - Operaciones de cocina/incendio de grasa

concept.definition: Fire caused by electrical wiring, equipment, or appliances.
Fire originating in or spreading from a fireplace or chimney structure.
Fire caused by or originating from a portable heating device.
Fire originating in or spreading from a wood-burning stove or its chimney.
Costs incurred for fire department services responding to a fire incident.

concept.display: Fire - Improper Storage & Handling of Chemicals/Fuels
concept.definition: Fire resulting from unsafe storage or handling of hazardous chemicals or fuels.

designation.value: Incendie - Entreposage et maniement incorrects de produits chimiques/carburants
Incendio - Almacenamiento y manejo inadecuado de químicos/combustibles

concept.definition: Fire where the specific cause or origin has not been determined.
Fraudulent creation, alteration, or imitation of documents or signatures.
Spoilage or loss of food stored in a freezer due to power failure or equipment malfunction.

concept.display: Fuel Leakage - Exterior Oil Storage Tank
concept.definition: Leakage of heating oil or fuel from an outdoor storage tank.

designation.value: Fuga de combustible - Tanque de almacenamiento exterior

concept.display: Fuel Leakage - Interior Oil Storage Tank
concept.definition: Leakage of heating oil or fuel from an indoor storage tank.

designation.value: Fuga de combustible - Tanque de almacenamiento interior

concept.definition: Unintentional breaking of glass windows, doors, or other glass fixtures.
Intentional breaking of glass by malicious acts or vandalism.
Glass breakage where the specific cause has not been determined.
Damage caused by falling ice pellets during a hailstorm.
Damage caused by collision with or impact from an aircraft or its parts.
Impact by a land vehicle operated by the insured party.

concept.display: Impact - Land Vehicle, Third Party Operator
concept.definition: Impact by a land vehicle operated by someone other than the insured.
Lightning strike damage to antennas or satellite dishes.
Lightning strike damage to a chimney structure.
Damage to electrical equipment caused by lightning strike or electrical surge from lightning.
Lightning damage where the specific point of strike or affected item has not been specified.
Assessment charged to a unit owner by a condominium corporation or homeowners association for damage to common property.
Loss or theft of keys necessitating lock replacement or re-keying.
Large-scale evacuation ordered by civil authorities due to an emergency or disaster.
Loss of property where the cause or circumstances of disappearance cannot be explained.
Damage to property caused by contamination or pollution from hazardous substances.
Legal liability for environmental contamination or pollution caused by the insured.
Denial of access to premises by order of civil authorities due to an emergency or hazard.
Physical damage to tangible property.
Violent disturbance by a crowd resulting in property damage.
Theft involving force, violence, or threat of harm to a person.
Backup of sewage or water from drains or sewers into a building.
Smoke damage resulting from a fire in a neighboring property or building.

designation.value: Fumée - Incendie dans des lieux/édifices contigus

concept.definition: Smoke damage caused by malfunction of heating or ventilation systems.
Smoke damage where the specific source has not been determined.
Tenant's legal responsibility for damage to rented premises.
Theft or attempted theft of property away from the insured premises, excluding theft from vehicles.

designation.value: Vol/tentative de vol - Hors des lieux assurés, autre que véhicule
Robo/intento de robo - Fuera de las instalaciones, no vehicular

concept.definition: Theft or attempted theft of property from a vehicle away from the insured premises.

designation.value: Vol/tentative de vol - Hors des lieux assurés, véhicule
Robo/intento de robo - Fuera de las instalaciones, vehicular

concept.display: Theft/Attempted Theft - On Premises, Non-forced Entry
concept.definition: Theft or attempted theft at the insured premises without signs of forced entry.

designation.value: Vol/tentative de vol - Sur les lieux assurés, pas d'effraction
Robo/intento de robo - En las instalaciones, sin entrada forzada

concept.definition: Damage to goods during transportation due to collision, upset, or vehicle overturn.
Damage to goods during transportation where the specific cause has not been determined.
Intentional damage to property while the building was unoccupied.
Intentional damage caused by detonation of explosives or incendiary devices.
Intentional damage where the insured party is suspected of involvement.
Intentional damage to property where the specific method has not been specified.
Voluntary payment made by the insured without establishing legal liability.
Voluntary payment of medical expenses without establishing legal liability.
Voluntary payment for property damage without establishing legal liability.

concept.display: Water Damage - Ice Build-up on Roof
concept.definition: Water damage resulting from ice accumulation on roof surfaces, often causing ice dams.

designation.value: Dégâts causés par l'eau - Accumulation de glace sur le toit
Daño por agua - Acumulación de hielo en el techo

concept.definition: Water damage where the specific source or cause has not been determined.

designation.value: Dégâts causés par l'eau - Non spécifié

concept.definition: Water escape or pipe rupture affecting the building structure.
Water escape or pipe rupture causing damage to building contents.
Water escape or rupture from gutters or downspouts.

designation.value: Déversement d'eau/éclatement - Gouttière ou tuyau de descente d'eau pluviales
Escape/ruptura de agua - Canaleta o bajante

concept.definition: Water escape or pipe rupture in a building due to freezing conditions.

designation.value: Déversement d'eau/éclatement dû au gel - Bâtiment
Escape/ruptura de agua - Congelación del edificio

concept.definition: Water escape or pipe rupture due to freezing in a building without adequate heating.

designation.value: Déversement d'eau/éclatement dû au gel - Bâtiment non chauffé
Escape/ruptura de agua - Congelación, edificio sin calefacción

concept.definition: Water escape or rupture from plumbing pipes or fixtures.

designation.value: Escape/ruptura de agua - Sistema de plomería

concept.definition: Gradual water infiltration or slow leakage through surfaces or joints.
Water escape or rupture from sewer lines or drainage systems.
Water escape or rupture from fire suppression sprinkler systems.

designation.value: Escape/ruptura de agua - Sistema de rociadores

concept.definition: Water damage resulting from malfunction or failure of a sump pump.

designation.value: Déversement d'eau/éclatement - Défaillance de la pompe de vidange
Escape/ruptura de agua - Fallo de bomba de sumidero

concept.definition: Water escape or rupture from swimming pool structures or equipment.
Water escape or rupture from a waterbed mattress.

designation.value: Escape/ruptura de agua - Cama de agua

concept.definition: Water escape or rupture where the specific source has not been determined.
Damage caused by high winds, hurricanes, tornadoes, or severe windstorms.
Scheduled coverage for specific valuable items that may be moved between locations.
Loss related to business operations conducted from a residential property.
Fraudulent use of personal information to impersonate another individual.
Accidental injury to an individual.
Uncontrolled fire in wildland areas, forests, or grasslands.
Failure or malfunction of mechanical equipment or machinery.
Surface damage to glass that creates scratches or marks without complete breakage.

designation.value: Égratignures ou marques sur le verre

concept.definition: Cause of loss not classified under standard categories.
Collision caused by backing a vehicle into another vehicle.
Collision resulting from failure to stop at a stop sign.

designation.value: A omis de s'arrêter à un panneau d'arrêt

concept.definition: Collision resulting from failure to yield right-of-way at a yield sign.

designation.value: A omis de céder le passage
Desobedeció señal de ceda el paso

concept.definition: Collision resulting from proceeding through a red traffic light.

designation.value: A omis de s'arrêter à un feu rouge

concept.definition: Collision occurring when exiting a parking lot onto a road or street.
Sudden and violent release of energy causing damage.
Fire damage to a vehicle where repair is economically feasible.
Complete destruction of a vehicle by fire rendering it a total loss.
Overflow of water onto normally dry land from rivers, lakes, or heavy rainfall.
Damage to vehicle glass or windshield.
Collision where the at-fault party leaves the scene without providing information.
Collision occurring during a lane change maneuver.
Vehicle collision with a person walking or standing on or near a roadway.
Electrical discharge from the atmosphere striking a vehicle or property.
Loss of vehicle control leading to a collision or single-vehicle accident.
Collision at an uncontrolled intersection where neither party has clear right-of-way.
Collision caused by opening a vehicle door into traffic or another vehicle.
Collision occurring within a parking lot or parking area.
Collision resulting from attempting to pass another vehicle using the road shoulder.
Collision when pulling away from a curb into traffic.

designation.value: A démarré à partir de la bordure de trottoir

concept.definition: Damage resulting from civil unrest, riots, or violent public disturbances.
Collision where the sides of two vehicles make contact.
Collision between a vehicle and an animal.
Complete theft of a motor vehicle.
Theft of vehicle parts or components, or unsuccessful attempt to steal a vehicle.

designation.value: Vol partiel ou tentative de vol

concept.definition: Collision when turning left in front of oncoming traffic.

designation.value: Giro a la izquierda - Auto aproximándose

concept.definition: Collision when turning left while another vehicle is overtaking.

designation.value: Giro a la izquierda - Auto rebasando

concept.definition: Intentional damage or defacement of property.
Damage from water or debris carried by wind or hail.
Combined damage from high winds and hail.
Collision resulting from traveling in the wrong direction on a one-way street.

designation.value: Mauvaise direction  - Rue à sens unique
Dirección incorrecta - Calle de un solo sentido

concept.definition: Low-severity collision where the insured is determined to be at fault.
Accident involving only one vehicle with no other vehicles involved.
Direct frontal collision between two vehicles traveling in opposite directions.
Collision between a vehicle and a bicycle or cyclist.
Collision where the insured is determined to not be responsible for the accident.
Collision where a vehicle is struck from behind by another vehicle.
Damage caused by household pets such as cats or dogs.
Theft or fraudulent acts committed by an employee.
Explosion caused by propane or natural gas appliances or fuel systems.
Explosion where the specific cause or source has not been determined.
Explosion caused by electrical arcing or short circuit.
Financial loss resulting from identity theft or fraudulent use of personal information.

concept.display: Fire- Spread from Third Party Property
concept.definition: Fire that originated on another person's property and spread to the insured property.

designation.value: Feu - Propagation provenant de la propriété d'un tiers
Incendio - Propagación desde propiedad de terceros

concept.definition: Damage caused by objects falling from above, such as trees, branches, or debris.
Accident involving three or more vehicles.

concept.display: Vandalism/Malicious Damage - Illegal Substance Cultivation and Manufacturing
concept.definition: Damage to property from illegal drug cultivation or manufacturing operations.

designation.value: Vandalisme/dommage volontaire - Cultivation et fabrication de substance illégale
Vandalismo/daño malicioso - Cultivo y fabricación de sustancias ilegales

concept.definition: Water damage from gradual penetration through building materials.

concept.display: Surface Water - Surface water enters structure at a point at surface of ground from accumulation of heavy rain, etc.
concept.definition: Water entering a building at ground level due to accumulated surface water from heavy rain or runoff.

designation.value: Eau de surface - Eau de surface entre dans la structure à un point en haut du sol provenant de l'accumulation de pluies fortes, etc.
Agua superficial - Agua superficial entra a la estructura a nivel del suelo por acumulación de lluvia intensa, etc.

concept.display: Exterior Water Line - Breakage of the exterior fresh/potable water line.
concept.definition: Rupture of the external water supply line connecting the property to the municipal water system.

designation.value: Ligne d'eau extérieure - Bris de la ligne extérieure d'eau fraîche/potable.
Línea de agua exterior - Ruptura de la línea exterior de agua potable/fresca.

concept.display: Exterior Sewer Line - Breakage of the exterior sewer line.
concept.definition: Rupture of the external sewer line connecting the property to the municipal sewer system.

designation.value: Ligne d'égoût extérieure - Bris de la ligne extérieure d'égoût.
Línea de alcantarillado exterior - Ruptura de la línea exterior de alcantarillado.

concept.display: Ground Water  - Sudden and accidental infiltration of water through a foundation
concept.definition: Unexpected penetration of groundwater through foundation walls or floor.

designation.value: Eau au sol - Infiltration soudaine et accidentelle d'eau à travers la fondation.
Agua subterránea - Infiltración súbita y accidental de agua a través de la cimentación

concept.display: Flood Water - Flood water enters structure at a point at surface of ground from inland water overflow, etc.
concept.definition: Entry of floodwater into a structure at ground level from overflow of rivers, lakes, or other inland water bodies.

designation.value: Eau d'inondation - Eau d'inondation entre dans la structure à un point en haut du sol provenant du débordement d'eau intérieure, etc.
Agua de inundación - Agua de inundación entra a la estructura a nivel del suelo por desbordamiento de aguas interiores, etc.

concept.definition: Collision with the insured vehicle while it was parked and unoccupied.
Collision not classified under standard collision categories.
Damage resulting from actions of children or animals.
Malicious software that encrypts data and demands payment for decryption, or cyber extortion demanding payment to prevent attacks.
Unauthorized access or exposure of confidential or sensitive data.
Cyberattack that disrupts normal operations by overwhelming systems with traffic, preventing legitimate access to services.
Malicious software designed to damage, disrupt, or gain unauthorized access to computer systems.
Fraudulent scheme where attackers compromise business email accounts to conduct unauthorized financial transactions or data theft.
Security weaknesses in third-party vendors, suppliers, or partners that can be exploited to compromise systems.

designation.value: Vulnerabilidades de la cadena de suministro
